1. Install the game.
2. Then open the downloaded folder-   Assassins_Creed_II-crack-SKIDROW
3. Now open the update folder and run-assassins_creed_2_1.01_us.exe
4. Now open the SKIDROW folder and copy everything from it and paste it in C:\Program Files\Ubisoft\Ubisoft Game Launcher. press yes to replace old files with new. Done.
5. Play game...
